metadata.title: CVE-2020-7221 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: mysql_install_db in MariaDB 10.4.7 through 10.4.11 allows privilegeescalation from the mysql user account to root because chown and chmod areperformed unsafely, as demonstrated by a symlink attack on a chmod 04755 ofauth_pam_tool_dir/auth_pam_tool. NOTE: this does not affect the OracleMySQL product, which implements mysql_install_db differently.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
